footer.designer: Designed with by Xiaoying Riley and adapted by jgregorio

about.heading: About Me
about.content:
Enthusiastic and passionate developer. Hands-on professional I took part in a variety of projects and build customers trust by teaching and providing first line support.

During my studies of Computer Systems Engineering I was awarded honors in the field of Programming and the Erasmus Scholarship. Before graduating, I did an internship in London. Working as developer since 2014 I achieve high understanding of Java and fluent using Groovy, JavaScript and SQL. I’ve learned Vue.js as JavaScript framework for developing personal projects.

Currently, seeking new opportunities to focus on top frameworks and make a step forward in my career.

mainProject.title: Chef Caprabo workshop calendar
paragraphs: Improving performance of searching using Apache Solr for consulting indexes instead database.
Improving user experience and reducing server load utilizing AJAX and JQuery.

projects.title: Pablo de Olavide University
paragraphs: Developing content synchronization system against Oracle database using Spring MVC and implementing OpenCms CRON functionality.
Single sign on integration into OpenCms for CAS server using pac4j library.

projects.title: SagaSuite Migration
paragraphs: Groovy based content migration and transformation tool. It opens a HTTP connection between two OpenCms servers, exchange data in JSON format, transform data using JSOUP and migrate content on the fly using extended CMS API.

projects.title: Diputación de Sevilla y Málaga (Sevilla and Málaga Council)
paragraphs: SOAP clients integration using JAX-WS and Apache AXIS for authenticating users against council system.

projects.title: Blog
paragraphs: Blog / Snippets repository created with JS framework Nuxt.js (Vue.js) based on PWA/ template.
Firebase for user authentication and posts persistence.
